attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Denotes the target URL of the link for standard a links

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description: Sets the 'rel' attribute on the rendered link

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Sets the 'target' attribute on the rendered link

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: When set to 'true', places the component in the active state with active styling

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: router-link prop: Denotes the target route of the link. When clicked, the value of the to prop will be passed to router.push() internally, so the value can be either a string or a Location descriptor object

attributes.name: append
attributes.description: router-link prop: Setting append prop always appends the relative path to the current path

attributes.name: replace
attributes.description: router-link prop: Setting the replace prop will call 'router.replace()' instead of 'router.push()' when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record

attributes.name: event
attributes.description: router-link prop: Specify the event that triggers the link. In most cases you should leave this as the default

attributes.name: activeClass
attributes.description: router-link prop: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active. Typically you will want to set this to class name 'active'

attributes.name: exact
attributes.description: router-link prop: The default active class matching behavior is inclusive match. Setting this prop forces the mode to exactly match the route

attributes.name: exactActiveClass
attributes.description: router-link prop: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active with exact match. Typically you will want to set this to class name 'active'

attributes.name: routerTag
attributes.description: router-link prop: Specify which tag to render, and it will still listen to click events for navigation. 'router-tag' translates to the tag prop on the final rendered router-link. Typically you should use the default value

attributes.name: noPrefetch
attributes.description: nuxt-link prop: To improve the responsiveness of your Nuxt.js applications, when the link will be displayed within the viewport, Nuxt.js will automatically prefetch the code splitted page. Setting 'no-prefetch' will disabled this feature for the specific link

attributes.name: routerTag
attributes.description: router-link prop: Specify which tag to render, and it will still listen to click events for navigation. 'router-tag' translates to the tag prop on the final rendered router-link. Typically you should use the default value

attributes.name: noPrefetch
attributes.description: nuxt-link prop: To improve the responsiveness of your Nuxt.js applications, when the link will be displayed within the viewport, Nuxt.js will automatically prefetch the code splitted page. Setting 'no-prefetch' will disabled this feature for the specific link

attributes.description: Sets the 'aria-invalid' attribute value on the wrapper element. When not provided, the 'state' prop will control the attribute

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: When set, renders the checkbox group in stacked mode

attributes.description: Render the form control in plain mode, rather than custom styled mode

attributes.name: buttons
attributes.description: When set, renderes the checkboxes in this group with button styling

attributes.name: buttonVariant
attributes.description: Specifies the Bootstrap contextual color theme variant the apply to the button style checkboxes

tags.description: Customized, cross-browser consistent, file input control that supports single file, multiple files, and directory upload.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Sets the value of the 'name' attribute on the form control

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Adds the 'required' attribute to the form control

attributes.name: form
attributes.description: ID of the form that the form control belongs to. Sets the 'form' attribute on the control

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: When set to 'true', attempts to auto-focus the control when it is mounted, or re-activated when in a keep-alive. Does not set the 'autofocus' attribute on the control

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Controls the validation state appearance of the component. 'true' for valid, 'false' for invalid', or 'null' for no validation state

attributes.name: plain
attributes.description: Render the form control in plain mode, rather than custom styled mode

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Set the size of the component's appearance. 'sm', 'md' (default), or 'lg'

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The current value of the file input. Will be a single File object or an array of File objects (if multiple or directory is set). Can be set to null, or an empty array to reset the file input

attributes.name: accept
attributes.description: Value to set on the file input's 'accept' attribute

attributes.name: capture
attributes.description: When set, will instruction the browser to use the devices camera (if supported)

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the 'placeholder' attribute value on the form control

attributes.name: browseText
attributes.description: Text content for the file browse button

attributes.name: dropPlaceholder
attributes.description: Text to display as the placeholder when fies are being dragged

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: When set, will allow multiple files to be selected. v-model will be an array

attributes.name: directory
attributes.description: Enable directory drop mode (on browsers that support directory mode)

attributes.name: noTraverse
attributes.description: For directory drop mode: returns files as a flat array

attributes.name: noDrop
attributes.description: Disable drag and drop mode

attributes.name: fileNameFormatter
attributes.description: Method to format the file names for display. Refer to the docs for details

events.name: change
events.description: original native change event on input

arguments.name: event
arguments.description: Native change event object

events.name: input
events.description: Updates the v-model value (see docs for more details)

arguments.name: file
arguments.description: Will be a single File object in single mode or an array of File objects in multiple mode

slots.name: file-name
slots.description: Scoped slot for formatting the file names

vue-properties.name: files
vue-properties.description: Array if File objects

vue-properties.name: names
vue-properties.description: Array of file names (strings)

tags.name: BFormGroup
tags.description: Easily add some structure to forms. Its purpose is to pair form controls with a legend or label, and to provide help text and invalid/valid feedback text, as well as visual (color) contextual state feedback.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Text to place in the label/legend of the form group

attributes.name: labelFor
attributes.description: Set to the ID of the singular form-control in the form-group. Do not set a value if there is more than one form control in the group.

attributes.name: labelSize
attributes.description: Sets the text size of the label: 'sm', 'md' (default) or 'lg'. Use this prop to have the label size match the form control size

attributes.name: labelSrOnly
attributes.description: Visually hides the label content, but makes it available to screen reader users

attributes.name: labelCols
attributes.description: Number of columns for the label width xs screens and up

attributes.name: labelColsSm
attributes.description: Number of columns for the label width sm screens and up

attributes.name: labelColsMd
attributes.description: Number of columns for the label width md screens and up

attributes.name: labelColsLg
attributes.description: Number of columns for the label width lg screens and up

attributes.name: labelColsXl
attributes.description: Number of columns for the label width xl screens and up

attributes.name: labelAlign
attributes.description: Text alignment 'left', 'center', 'right' for the label xs screens and up

attributes.name: labelAlignSm
attributes.description: Text alignment 'left', 'center', 'right' for the label sm screens and up

attributes.name: labelAlignMd
attributes.description: Text alignment 'left', 'center', 'right' for the label md screens and up

attributes.name: labelAlignLg
attributes.description: Text alignment 'left', 'center', 'right' for the label lg screens and up

attributes.name: labelAlignXl
attributes.description: Text alignment 'left', 'center', 'right' for the label xl screens and up

attributes.name: labelClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to add to the label/legend element

attributes.name: description

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Sets the value of the 'name' attribute on the form control

attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state

attributes.description: Adds the 'required' attribute to the form control

attributes.description: ID of the form that the form control belongs to. Sets the 'form' attribute on the control

attributes.description: When set to 'true', attempts to auto-focus the control when it is mounted, or re-activated when in a keep-alive. Does not set the 'autofocus' attribute on the control

attributes.description: Set the size of the component's appearance. 'sm', 'md' (default), or 'lg'

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Controls the validation state appearance of the component. 'true' for valid, 'false' for invalid', or 'null' for no validation state

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The current value of the input.  Result will always be a string, except when the 'number' prop is used

attributes.description: Sets the 'aria-invalid' attribute with the specified value

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Sets the 'readonly' attribute on hte form control

attributes.description: Set the form control as readonly and renders the control to look like plain text (no borders)

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Sets the 'autocomplete' attribute value on the form control

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the 'placeholder' attribute value on the form control

attributes.name: formatter
attributes.description: reference to a function for formatting the input

attributes.name: lazyFormatter
attributes.description: When set, the input is formatted on blur instead of each keystroke (if there is a formatter specified)

attributes.name: trim
attributes.description: When set, trims any leading and trailing white space from the input value. Emulates the Vue '.trim' v-model modifier

attributes.name: number
attributes.description: When set attempts to convert the input value to a native number. Emulates the Vue '.number' v-model modifier

attributes.name: lazy
attributes.description: When set, updates the v-model on 'change'/'blur' events instead of 'input'. Emulates the Vue '.lazy' v-model modifier

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: When set to a number of milliseconds greater than zero, will debounce the user input. Has no effect if prop 'lazy' is set

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of input to render. See the docs for supported types

attributes.name: noWheel
attributes.description: For number-like inputs, disables the mouse wheel from incrementing or decrementing the value

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Value to set in the 'min' attribute on the input. Used by number-like inputs

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Value to set in the 'max' attribute on the input. Used by number-like inputs

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Value to set in the 'step' attribute on the input. Used by number-like inputs

attributes.name: list
attributes.description: The ID of the associated datalist element or component

events.name: input
events.description: Input event triggered by user interaction. Emitted after any formatting (not including 'trim' or 'number' props) and after the v-model is updated

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Current value of input

events.name: change
events.description: Change event triggered by user interaction. Emitted after any formatting (not including 'trim' or 'number' props) and after the v-model is updated.

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Current value of input

events.description: Emitted to update the v-model

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Value of input, after any formatting. Not emitted if the value does not change

events.name: blur

tags.name: BTextarea
tags.description:
Create multi-line text inputs with support for auto height sizing, minimum and maximum number of rows, and contextual validation states.

*Alias for BFormTextarea*

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Sets the value of the 'name' attribute on the form control

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Adds the 'required' attribute to the form control

attributes.name: form
attributes.description: ID of the form that the form control belongs to. Sets the 'form' attribute on the control

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: When set to 'true', attempts to auto-focus the control when it is mounted, or re-activated when in a keep-alive. Does not set the 'autofocus' attribute on the control

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Set the size of the component's appearance. 'sm', 'md' (default), or 'lg'

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Controls the validation state appearance of the component. 'true' for valid, 'false' for invalid', or 'null' for no validation state

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The current value of the textarea. Result will always be a string, except when the 'number' prop is used

attributes.name: ariaInvalid
attributes.description: Sets the 'aria-invalid' attribute with the specified value

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Sets the 'readonly' attribute on hte form control

attributes.name: plaintext
attributes.description: Set the form control as readonly and renders the control to look like plain text (no borders)

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Sets the 'autocomplete' attribute value on the form control

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the 'placeholder' attribute value on the form control

attributes.name: formatter
attributes.description: reference to a function for formatting the textarea

attributes.name: lazyFormatter
attributes.description: When set, the textarea is formatted on blur instead of each keystroke (if there is a formatter specified)

attributes.name: trim
attributes.description: When set, trims any leading and trailing white space from the input value. Emulates the Vue '.trim' v-model modifier

attributes.name: number
attributes.description: When set attempts to convert the input value to a native number. Emulates the Vue '.number' v-model modifier

attributes.name: lazy
attributes.description: When set, updates the v-model on 'change'/'blur' events instead of 'input'. Emulates the Vue '.lazy' v-model modifier

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: When set to a number of milliseconds greater than zero, will debounce the user input. Has no effect if prop 'lazy' is set

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: The minimum number of rows to display. Must be a value greater than 1

attributes.name: maxRows
attributes.description: The maximum number of rows to show. When provided, the textarea will grow (or shrink) to fit the content up to maximum rows

attributes.name: wrap
attributes.description: The value to place on the textarea's 'wrap' attribute. Controls how line break are returned

attributes.name: noResize
attributes.description: When set, disabled the browser's resize handle which prevents the user from changing the height of the textarea. Automatically set when in auto height mode

attributes.name: noAutoShrink
attributes.description: When set, prevents the auto height textarea from shrinking to fit the content

events.name: input
events.description: Input event triggered by user interaction. Emitted after any formatting (not including 'trim' or 'number' props) and after the v-model is updated

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Current value of textarea

events.name: change
events.description: Change event triggered by user interaction. Emitted after any formatting (not including 'trim' or 'number' props) and after the v-model is updated.

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Current value of the textarea

events.name: update
events.description: Emitted to update the v-model

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Value of textarea, after any formatting. Not emitted if the value does nto change

events.name: blur
events.description: Emitted after the textarea looses focus

arguments.name: event
arguments.description: Native blur event (before any optional formatting occurs)

tags.name: BImg
tags.description: Create responsive images, optionally adding lightweight styles to them — all via props. Support for rounded images, thumbnail styling, alignment, and even the ability to create blank images with an optional solid background color, and lazy loaded images.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: URL to set for the 'src' attribute

attributes.name: srcset
attributes.description: One or more strings separated by commas (or an array of strings), indicating possible image sources for the user agent to use

attributes.name: sizes
attributes.description: One or more strings separated by commas (or an array of strings), indicating a set of source sizes. Optionally used in combination with the srcset prop

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: Value to set for the 'alt' attribute

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: The value to set on the image's 'width' attribute

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: The value to set on the image's 'height' attribute

attributes.name: block
attributes.description: Forces the image to display as a block element rather than the browser default of inline-block element

attributes.name: fluid
attributes.description: Makes the image responsive. The image will shrink as needed or grow up the the image's native width

attributes.name: fluidGrow
attributes.description: Similar to the 'fluid' prop, but allows the image to scale up past it's native width

attributes.name: rounded
attributes.description: When set to 'true', makes the image corners slightly rounded. Can also be used to disable rounded corners or make the image a circle/oval. See docs for details

attributes.name: thumbnail
attributes.description: Adds a thumbnail border around the image

attributes.name: left
attributes.description: Floats the image to the left when set

attributes.name: right
attributes.description: Floats the image to the right when set

attributes.name: center
attributes.description: Centers the image horizontally

attributes.name: blank
attributes.description: Creates a blank/transparent image via an SVG data URI

attributes.name: blankColor
attributes.description: Sets the color of the blank image to the CSS color value specified

attributes.name: height

attributes.name: blankSrc

attributes.name: blankColor
attributes.description: Sets the color of the blank placeholder image to the CSS color value specified

attributes.name: blankWidth

attributes.name: blankHeight
attributes.description: The value to set on the placeholder image's 'height' attribute. Defaults to value of the 'height' prop

attributes.name: show
attributes.description: If set to true, will force show the image specified via the 'src' prop

attributes.name: fluid
attributes.description: Makes the image responsive. The image will shrink as needed or grow up the the image's native width

attributes.name: fluidGrow
attributes.description: Similar to the 'fluid' prop, but allows the image to scale up past it's native width

attributes.name: block
attributes.description: Forces the image to display as a block element rather than the browser default of inline-block element

attributes.name: thumbnail
attributes.description: Adds a thumbnail border around the image

attributes.name: rounded
attributes.description: When set to 'true', makes the image corners slightly rounded. Can also be used to disable rounded corners or make the image a circle/oval. See docs for details

attributes.name: left
attributes.description: Floats the image to the left when set

attributes.name: right
attributes.description: Floats the image to the right when set

attributes.name: center
attributes.description: Centers the image horizontally

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: Number of pixels away from the viewport edge before the lazy image is loaded

tags.name: BContainer
tags.description: Use the powerful mobile-first flexbox grid (via the <b-container>, <b-row>, <b-form-row> and <b-col> components) to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, CSS Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.

attributes.description: Specify the HTML tag to render instead of the default tag

attributes.name: fluid
attributes.description: When set, makes the row 100% wide all the time

tags.name: BLink
tags.description: Use BootstrapVue's custom <b-link> component for generating a standard <a> link or <router-link>. <b-link> supports the disabled state and click event propagation.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Denotes the target URL of the link for standard a links

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description: Sets the 'rel' attribute on the rendered link

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Sets the 'target' attribute on the rendered link

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: When set to 'true', places the component in the active state with active styling

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: router-link prop: Denotes the target route of the link. When clicked, the value of the to prop will be passed to router.push() internally, so the value can be either a string or a Location descriptor object

attributes.name: append
attributes.description: router-link prop: Setting append prop always appends the relative path to the current path

attributes.name: replace
attributes.description: router-link prop: Setting the replace prop will call 'router.replace()' instead of 'router.push()' when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record

attributes.name: event
attributes.description: router-link prop: Specify the event that triggers the link. In most cases you should leave this as the default

attributes.name: activeClass
attributes.description: router-link prop: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active. Typically you will want to set this to class name 'active'

attributes.name: exact
attributes.description: router-link prop: The default active class matching behavior is inclusive match. Setting this prop forces the mode to exactly match the route

attributes.name: exactActiveClass
attributes.description: router-link prop: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active with exact match. Typically you will want to set this to class name 'active'

attributes.name: routerTag
attributes.description: router-link prop: Specify which tag to render, and it will still listen to click events for navigation. 'router-tag' translates to the tag prop on the final rendered router-link. Typically you should use the default value

attributes.name: noPrefetch
attributes.description: nuxt-link prop: To improve the responsiveness of your Nuxt.js applications, when the link will be displayed within the viewport, Nuxt.js will automatically prefetch the code splitted page. Setting 'no-prefetch' will disabled this feature for the specific link

events.name: click
events.description: when link clicked

arguments.name: mouseEvent
arguments.description: Native click event

tags.name: BModal
tags.description: Modals are streamlined, but flexible dialog prompts powered by JavaScript and CSS. They support a number of use cases from user notification to completely custom content and feature a handful of helpful sub-components, sizes, variants, accessibility, and more.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Set the size of the modal's width. 'sm', 'md' (default), 'lg', or 'xl'

attributes.name: centered
attributes.description: Vertically centers the modal in the viewport

attributes.name: scrollable
attributes.description: Enables scrolling of the modal body

attributes.name: buttonSize
attributes.description: Size of the built in footer buttons: 'sm', 'md' (default), or 'lg'

attributes.name: noStacking
attributes.description: Prevents other modals from stacking over this one

attributes.name: noFade
attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the fade animation/transition on the component

attributes.name: noCloseOnBackdrop
attributes.description: Disables the ability to close the modal by clicking the backdrop

attributes.name: noCloseOnEsc
attributes.description: Disables the ability to close the modal by pressing ESC

attributes.name: noEnforceFocus
attributes.description: Disables the enforce focus routine which maintains focus inside the modal

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Text content to place in the title

attributes.name: titleHtml
attributes.description: HTML string content to place in the title. Use with caution

attributes.name: titleTag
attributes.description: Specify the HTML tag to render instead of the default tag for the title

attributes.name: titleClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the title

attributes.name: titleSrOnly
attributes.description: Wraps the title in an '.sr-only' wrapper

attributes.name: ariaLabel
attributes.description: Explicitly supply an 'aria-label' attribute for the modal. Should be set when the modal has no title. When not set 'aria-labelledby' will point to the modal's title

attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the header background

attributes.name: headerBorderVariant
attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the header border

attributes.name: headerTextVariant
attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the header text

attributes.name: headerCloseVariant
attributes.description: Text theme color variant to apply to the header close button

attributes.name: headerClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the '.modal-header' wrapper element

attributes.name: bodyBgVariant
attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the body background

attributes.name: bodyTextVariant
attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the body text

attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the footer background

attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the footer border

attributes.name: footerTextVariant
attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the footer text

attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the '.modal-footer' wrapper element

attributes.name: hideHeader
attributes.description: Disables rendering of the modal header

attributes.name: hideFooter
attributes.description: Disables rendering of the modal footer

attributes.name: hideHeaderClose
attributes.description: Disables rendering of the modal header's close button

attributes.name: hideBackdrop
attributes.description: Disables rendering of the modal backdrop

attributes.name: okOnly
attributes.description: Disables rendering of the default footer Cancel button

attributes.name: okDisabled
attributes.description: Places the default footer OK button in the disabled state

attributes.name: cancelDisabled
attributes.description: Places the default footer Cancel button in the disabled state

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: The current visibility state of the modal

attributes.name: returnFocus
attributes.description: HTML Element reference, CSS selector, or component reference to return focus to when the modal closes. When not set, will return focus to the element that last had focus before the modal opened

attributes.name: headerCloseLabel
attributes.description: Value of the 'aria-label' on the header close button

attributes.name: cancelTitle
attributes.description: Text string to place in the default footer Cancel button

attributes.name: cancelTitleHtml
attributes.description: HTML string to place in the default footer Cancel button. Use with caution

attributes.name: okTitle
attributes.description: Text string to place in the default footer OK button

attributes.name: okTitleHtml
attributes.description: HTML string to place in the default footer OK button. Use with caution

attributes.name: cancelVariant
attributes.description: Button color theme variant to apply to the default footer Cancel button

attributes.name: okVariant
attributes.description: Button color theme variant to apply to the default footer OK button

attributes.name: lazy
attributes.description: When the modal has the `static` prop set, renders the modal content lazily

attributes.name: busy
attributes.description: Places the built in default footer OK and Cancel buttons in the disabled state

attributes.name: static
attributes.description: Renders the content of the component in-place in the DOM, rather than portalling it to be appended to the body element

attributes.name: autoFocusButton
attributes.description: Specify which built-in button to focus once the modal opens: 'ok', 'cancel', or 'close'

events.name: change
events.description: New modal visibility state. Used to update the v-model

arguments.name: isVisible

tags.name: BNav
tags.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description: Specify the HTML tag to render instead of the default tag

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: Proportionately fills all horizontal space with nav items. All horizontal space is occupied, but not every nav item has the same width

attributes.name: justified
attributes.description: Fills all horizontal space with nav items, but unlike 'fill', every nav item will be the same width

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Align the nav items in the nav: 'start' (or 'left'), 'center', 'end' (or 'right')

attributes.name: tabs
attributes.description: Renders the nav items with the appearance of tabs

attributes.name: pills
attributes.description: Renders the nav items with the appearance of pill buttons

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: Renders the nav vertically

attributes.name: small
attributes.description: Makes the nav smaller

attributes.name: cardHeader
attributes.description: Set this prop when the nav is placed inside a card header

tags.name: BNavItem
tags.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Denotes the target URL of the link for standard a links

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description: Sets the 'rel' attribute on the rendered link

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Sets the 'target' attribute on the rendered link

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: When set to 'true', places the component in the active state with active styling

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: router-link prop: Denotes the target route of the link. When clicked, the value of the to prop will be passed to router.push() internally, so the value can be either a string or a Location descriptor object

attributes.name: append
attributes.description: router-link prop: Setting append prop always appends the relative path to the current path

attributes.name: replace
attributes.description: router-link prop: Setting the replace prop will call 'router.replace()' instead of 'router.push()' when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record

attributes.name: event
attributes.description: router-link prop: Specify the event that triggers the link. In most cases you should leave this as the default

attributes.name: activeClass
attributes.description: router-link prop: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active. Typically you will want to set this to class name 'active'

attributes.name: exact
attributes.description: router-link prop: The default active class matching behavior is inclusive match. Setting this prop forces the mode to exactly match the route

attributes.name: exactActiveClass
attributes.description: router-link prop: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active with exact match. Typically you will want to set this to class name 'active'

attributes.name: routerTag
attributes.description: router-link prop: Specify which tag to render, and it will still listen to click events for navigation. 'router-tag' translates to the tag prop on the final rendered router-link. Typically you should use the default value

attributes.name: noPrefetch
attributes.description: nuxt-link prop: To improve the responsiveness of your Nuxt.js applications, when the link will be displayed within the viewport, Nuxt.js will automatically prefetch the code splitted page. Setting 'no-prefetch' will disabled this feature for the specific link

attributes.name: linkAttrs
attributes.description: Additional attributes to place on the nested link element

attributes.name: linkClasses
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to place on the nested link element

tags.name: BTable
tags.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Array of items to display, or an items provider function reference. Refer to the docs for details

attributes.name: fields
attributes.description: Array of field names or array of field definition objects

attributes.name: primaryKey
attributes.description: Name of a table field that contains a guaranteed unique value per row. Needed for tbody transition support, and also speeds up table rendering

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Currently displayed row data. Read-only. Do not set a value on this prop

attributes.name: striped
attributes.description: Applies striping to the tbody rows

attributes.name: bordered
attributes.description: Adds borders to all the cells and headers

attributes.name: borderless
attributes.description: Removes all borders from cells

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: Adds an outline border to the table element

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description: Places the table in dark mode

attributes.name: hover
attributes.description: Enables hover styling on rows

attributes.name: small
attributes.description: Renders the table with smaller cell padding

attributes.name: fixed
attributes.description: Makes all columns equal width (fixed layout table). Will speed up rendering for large tables. Column widths can be set via CSS or colgroup

attributes.name: responsive
attributes.description: Makes the table responsive in width, adding a horizontal scrollbar. Set to true for always responsive or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from responsive to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

attributes.name: stickyHeader
attributes.description: Makes the table header sticky. Set to true for a maximum height 300px tall table, or set to any valid CSS hight (including units)

attributes.name: noBorderCollapse
attributes.description: Disable's the collapsing of table borders. Useful when table has sticky headers or columns

attributes.name: captionTop
attributes.description: Visually place the table caption above the table. Default is below.

attributes.name: tableVariant
attributes.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the entire table

attributes.name: tableClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the table element

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: Place the table in stacked mode. Set to true for always stacked, or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from stacked to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

attributes.name: headVariant
attributes.description: Header variant: 'light' or 'dark', or unset. May take precedence over head-row-variant

attributes.name: headRowVariant
attributes.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the tr element in the thead

attributes.name: theadClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the thead element

attributes.name: theadTrClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the thead

attributes.name: footClone
attributes.description: Enable to the footer of the table, and clone the header content by default

attributes.name: footVariant
attributes.description: Footer variant: 'light' or 'dark', or unset. May take precedence over foot-row-variant

attributes.name: footRowVariant
attributes.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the tr element in the tfoot. Falls back to head-row-variant

attributes.name: tfootClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tfoot element

attributes.name: tfootTrClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the tfoot

attributes.name: tbodyTrClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the tbody. Can be a function that returns a class (see docs for details)

attributes.name: detailsTdClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the td element in the details row

attributes.name: tbodyTransitionProps
attributes.description: Vue 'transition-group' properties. When provided will make the tbody a Vue 'transition-group' component

attributes.name: tbodyTransitionHandlers
attributes.description: Vue 'transition-group' event handlers. When provided will make the tbody a Vue 'transition-group' component

attributes.name: tbodyClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tbody element

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: Criteria for filtering. Internal filtering supports only string or RegExpr criteria.

attributes.name: filterFunction
attributes.description: Reference to a function to use instead of the internal filtering function. Refer to the docs for details

attributes.name: filterIgnoredFields
attributes.description: Array of top level fields to ignore when filtering the item data

attributes.name: filterIncludedFields
attributes.description: Array of fields to include when filtering. Overrides filter-ignore-fields

attributes.name: filterDebounce
attributes.description: Time in milliseconds to debounce changes to the filter criteria before filtering the records

attributes.name: sortBy
attributes.description: Field name that is currently being sorted. Set to null to clear sorting. Syncable with the .sync prop modifier

attributes.name: sortDesc
attributes.description: Set to true to sort the column in descending order. Syncable with the .sync prop modifier

attributes.name: sortDirection
attributes.description: The initial sorting direction to sort an unsorted column by: 'asc', 'desc', or 'last' (to use the previous sort direction)

attributes.name: sortCompare
attributes.description: A reference to a function for sort-comparing tow rows of data. Defaults to the internal sort compare routine. See docs for details

attributes.name: sortCompareOptions
attributes.description: An object containing sort configuration for the 'String.prototype.sortLocale' method. See docs for details

attributes.name: sortCompareLocale
attributes.description: The locale string (or array of locale string) that specified the language when sorting. See docs for details

attributes.name: sortNullLast
attributes.description: When sorting, null and undefined values will be sorted first (or last, depending on 'sort-desc'). Set this prop to sort null values last. Only applicable to internal sorting

attributes.name: noSortReset
attributes.description: When a table is sortable, clicking on any non-sortable column heading will clear the current sort values. Set this prop to disable this feature

attributes.name: labelSortAsc
attributes.description: String to place in the header cell's 'aria-label' when clicking the cell will change the sort direction to ascending

attributes.name: labelSortDesc
attributes.description: String to place in the header cell's 'aria-label' when clicking the cell will change the sort direction to descending

attributes.name: labelSortClear
attributes.description: String to place in the header cell's 'aria-label' when clicking the cell will clear the current sorting direction

attributes.name: noLocalSorting
attributes.description: Disabled the internal sorting routine, and expects the user to provde the items sorted. Sorting controls will still be available

attributes.name: noFooterSorting
attributes.description: When the build in formatter is used, setting this prop will disable the sorting ability in the footer

attributes.name: sortIconLeft
attributes.description: Positions the sort control to the left of the header text. Default is on the right of the header text

attributes.name: perPage
attributes.description: Number of rows to show per page. Set to 0 to disable pagination

attributes.name: currentPage
attributes.description: The current page number to display when the table is paginated. Starting from 1 and up

attributes.name: caption
attributes.description: Text string to place in the caption element

attributes.name: captionHtml
attributes.description: HTML string to place in the caption element. Use with caution

attributes.name: selectable
attributes.description: When set, places the table body rows in selectable mode

attributes.name: selectMode
attributes.description: The selectable mode for the table when 'selectable' is set. Possible values: 'single', 'multi' or 'range'

attributes.name: selectedVariant
attributes.description: Bootstrap color theme variant to set selected rows to. Use any of the standard Bootstrap theme color variants, or the special table row variant 'active' (default). Set to an empty string to not use a variant

attributes.name: noSelectOnClick
attributes.description: Disables row selection via click events. Row selection will be only available programmatically

attributes.name: showEmpty
attributes.description: When enabled, and there are no item records to show, shows a message that there are no rows to show

attributes.name: emptyText
attributes.description: Text string to show when the table has no items to show

attributes.name: emptyHtml
attributes.description: HTML string to show when the table has no items to show. Usw with caution

attributes.name: emptyFilteredText
attributes.default: "There are no records matching your request"
attributes.description: Text string to show when the table has no items to show due to filtering

attributes.name: emptyFilteredHtml
attributes.description: HTML string to show when the table has no items to show due to filtering. Use with caution

attributes.name: busy
attributes.description: When set, forces the table into the busy state.Automatically set when an items provider function is being called

attributes.name: noProviderPaging
attributes.description: When set, uses internal paging to pagination the data. Otherwise the items provider is expected to perform the paging

attributes.name: noProviderSorting
attributes.description: When set, uses internal sorting to sort the data. Otherwise the items provider is expected to perform the sorting

attributes.name: noProviderFiltering
attributes.description: When set, uses internal filtering to pagination the data. Otherwise the provider is expected to perform the filtering

attributes.name: apiUrl
attributes.description: Pass through prop. Passed as part of the context object sent to the items provider function

tags.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Array of items to display

attributes.name: fields
attributes.description: Array of field names or array of field definition objects

attributes.name: primaryKey
attributes.description: Name of a table field that contains a guaranteed unique value per row. Needed for tbody transition support, and also speeds up table rendering

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Currently displayed row data. Read-only. Do not set a value on this prop

attributes.name: striped
attributes.description: Applies striping to the tbody rows

attributes.name: bordered
attributes.description: Adds borders to all the cells and headers

attributes.name: borderless
attributes.description: Removes all borders from cells

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: Adds an outline border to the table element

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description: Places the table in dark mode

attributes.name: hover
attributes.description: Enables hover styling on rows

attributes.name: small
attributes.description: Renders the table with smaller cell padding

attributes.name: fixed
attributes.description: Makes all columns equal width (fixed layout table). Will speed up rendering for large tables. Column widths can be set via CSS or colgroup

attributes.name: responsive
attributes.description: Makes the table responsive in width, adding a horizontal scrollbar. Set to true for always responsive or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from responsive to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

attributes.name: stickyHeader
attributes.description: Makes the table header sticky. Set to true for a maximum height 300px tall table, or set to any valid CSS hight (including units)

attributes.name: noBorderCollapse
attributes.description: Disable's the collapsing of table borders. Useful when table has sticky headers or columns

attributes.name: captionTop
attributes.description: Visually place the table caption above the table. Default is below.

attributes.name: tableVariant
attributes.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the entire table

attributes.name: tableClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the table element

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: Place the table in stacked mode. Set to true for always stacked, or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from stacked to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

attributes.name: headVariant
attributes.description: Header variant: 'light' or 'dark', or unset. May take precedence over head-row-variant

attributes.name: headRowVariant
attributes.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the tr element in the thead

attributes.name: theadClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the thead element

attributes.name: theadTrClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the thead

attributes.name: footClone
attributes.description: Enable to the footer of the table, and clone the header content by default

attributes.name: footVariant
attributes.description: Footer variant: 'light' or 'dark', or unset. May take precedence over foot-row-variant

attributes.name: footRowVariant
attributes.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the tr element in the tfoot. Falls back to head-row-variant

attributes.name: tfootClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tfoot element

attributes.name: tfootTrClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the tfoot

attributes.name: tbodyTrClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the tbody. Can be a function that returns a class (see docs for details)

attributes.name: detailsTdClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the td element in the details row

attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tbody element

tags.description: Create a widget of tabbable panes of local content. The tabs component is built upon navs and cards internally, and provides full keyboard navigation control of the tabs.

attributes.name: id

attributes.description: Specify the HTML tag to render instead of the default tag

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: Proportionately fills all horizontal space with nav items. All horizontal space is occupied, but not every nav item has the same width

attributes.name: justified
attributes.description: Fills all horizontal space with nav items, but unlike 'fill', every nav item will be the same width

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Align the nav items in the nav: 'start' (or 'left'), 'center', 'end' (or 'right')

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: Renders the tab controls vertically

attributes.name: card
attributes.description: When set to true, renders the tabs the the appropriate styles to be placed into a 'b-card'

attributes.name: end
attributes.description: Place the tab controls at the bottom (horizontal tabs), or right (vertical tabs)

attributes.name: noFade
attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the fade animation/transition on the component

attributes.name: noNavStyle
attributes.description: Do not render the tab controls with tab styling

attributes.name: noKeyNav
attributes.description: Disable keyboard navigation of the tab controls

attributes.name: lazy
attributes.description: Lazily render the b-tab contents when shown

attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the active nav item tab control

attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the currently active tab

tags.name: BTab
tags.description: Create a widget of tabbable panes of local content. The tabs component is built upon navs and cards internally, and provides full keyboard navigation control of the tabs.

attributes.name: id

tags.name: BToast
tags.description: Push notifications to your visitors with a toast, a lightweight and easily customizable alert message.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The toast's title text

attributes.name: toaster
attributes.description: The name of the toaster target to render the toast in

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: When true, shows the toast

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

attributes.name: isStatus
attributes.description: When set to 'true', makes the toast have attributes aria-live=polite and role=status. When 'false' aria-live will be 'assertive' and role will be 'alert'

attributes.name: appendToast
attributes.description: When true, the toast will be appended to the bottom on the visible toasts, otherwise it will be prepended

attributes.name: noAutoHide
attributes.description: When set, disabled the toast from automatically dismissing itself

attributes.name: autoHideDelay
attributes.description: The number of milliseconds before the toast auto dismisses itself

attributes.name: noCloseButton
attributes.description: When set, hides the close button in the toast header

attributes.name: noFade
attributes.description: When set to 'true', disables the fade animation/transition on the component

attributes.name: noHoverPause
attributes.description: When set, disables the pausing of hte auto hide delay when the mouse hovers the toast

attributes.name: solid
attributes.description: When set, renderes the toast with a solid background rather than translucent

attributes.name: toastClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to add to the toast wrapper element

attributes.name: headerClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to add to the toast header element

attributes.name: bodyClass
attributes.description: CSS class (or classes) to add to the toast body element

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Denotes the target URL of the link for standard a links

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: router-link prop: Denotes the target route of the link. When clicked, the value of the to prop will be passed to router.push() internally, so the value can be either a string or a Location descriptor object

attributes.name: static
attributes.description: Renders the content of the component in-place in the DOM, rather than portalling it to be appended to the body element

attributes.description: Element string ID, or a reference to an element or component, that you want to trigger the tooltip.

attributes.description: Specify which triggers will show the tooltip. Supported values are 'click', 'hover', 'focus'. Refer to the docs for special triggers 'blur' and 'manual'

attributes.description: Placement of the tooltip: One of 'top', 'bottom', 'right', 'left', 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right', 'left-top', 'left-bottom', 'right-top', 'right-bottom'

attributes.name: boundary
